column2: description

[{"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "Heavy showers and severe squally thunderstorms swept across East Asia, delivering more than 30 mm of rain with gusts over 100 km/h."}, {"region": "East Africa produced flash floods", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall over East Africa produced flash floods and landslides as rivers rose sharply."}, {"region": "central North America carved a narrow path about 7.4 mi long", "descrpition": "A stationary landspout tornado in central North America carved a narrow path about 7.4 mi long and 380 yd wide."}, {"region": "south", "descrpition": "Persistent heavy rain over the south of South America delivered more than 420 mm of rainfall, causing widespread flooding."}, {"region": "western Europe produced more than 100 mm within 24 hours", "descrpition": "Heavy rain in western Europe produced more than 100 mm within 24 hours, causing flooding in the Saarland region."}, {"region": "southeast Australia resulted in dry weather", "descrpition": "High pressure over southeast Australia resulted in dry weather and below‑average rainfall."}]

[{"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Light showers and mainly cloudy skies covered East Asia, bringing a few millimetres of rain."}, {"region": "East Africa continued", "descrpition": "Persistent heavy rains across East Africa continued to saturate soils and swell rivers."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "A strong EF3 tornado traveled roughly 3.29 mi and 210 yd wide during a multi‑day severe weather outbreak."}, {"region": "south", "descrpition": "Heavy downpours continued across the south of South America, increasing flood depths."}, {"region": "western Europe", "descrpition": "Rain showers continued across western Europe; saturated soils led to localized flooding."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Clear skies and mild temperatures covered southeast Australia with minimal precipitation."}]

[{"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Scattered showers dotted East Asia under cloudy skies, with occasional thunderstorms."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Strong winds and heavy rains associated with a tropical cyclone threatened the coast of East Africa, causing large waves and coastal flooding."}, {"region": "central North America", "descrpition": "Clusters of severe thunderstorms produced hail and wind damage across central North America with several EF1 tornadoes reported."}, {"region": "south", "descrpition": "The prolonged rainstorm added further heavy rain to the south of South America as climate change intensified the event by about 6–9%."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Persistent rain and strong winds affected northern Europe; river levels remained high."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Light showers dotted parts of southeast Australia but rainfall remained low."}]

[{"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "A strong easterly airflow triggered heavy showers over East Asia, producing around 145 mm of rain and local totals over 400 mm."}, {"region": "coastal East Africa", "descrpition": "Downpours continued along coastal East Africa; strong winds and high waves persisted."}, {"region": "central North America", "descrpition": "Severe weather continued across central North America with multiple tornado reports and damaging winds."}, {"region": "90%", "descrpition": "Southern parts of South America remained under torrential rain; flooding affected over 90% of the region."}, {"region": "central Europe", "descrpition": "Periods of heavy rain spread across central Europe as moisture‑laden air produced storms."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Dry and sunny conditions dominated as high pressure persisted."}]

[{"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "Cloudy conditions with isolated showers persisted across Southeast Asia."}, {"region": "East Africa brought moderate", "descrpition": "Scattered thunderstorms across East Africa brought moderate to heavy rain."}, {"region": "Midwest", "descrpition": "Scattered thunderstorms brought heavy rain and gusty winds to the Midwest; flash floods developed in some areas."}, {"region": "ease", "descrpition": "Heavy rains began to ease, but rivers remained swollen from accumulations exceeding 420 mm."}, {"region": "eastern Europe", "descrpition": "Showers and thunderstorms moved across eastern Europe, delivering moderate rainfall."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Cloudy spells with scattered light rain occurred; totals stayed low."}]

[{"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Continued cloudy weather with occasional showers affected East Asia."}, {"region": "East Africa led", "descrpition": "Prolonged rains in East Africa led to widespread flooding; some areas recorded over 200 mm of rain."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "A multi‑day tornado outbreak began as severe storms swept through the Plains with numerous tornado reports."}, {"region": "eastern South America", "descrpition": "Cloudy skies and light rain lingered over eastern South America as conditions slowly improved."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Cloudy skies with scattered showers covered western Europe; conditions remained unsettled."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Settled weather continued with mild temperatures."}]

[{"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Hot, dry conditions returned in South Asia as a heatwave pushed temperatures above 40 °C."}, {"region": "Central Africa", "descrpition": "Thundershowers swept across Central Africa, delivering moderate rainfall."}, {"region": "region", "descrpition": "Tornado‑producing storms continued across the region; strong winds and hail damaged property."}, {"region": "south", "descrpition": "Drier conditions spread across the south; floodwaters slowly receded."}, {"region": "central Europe", "descrpition": "A trough brought showers across central Europe; rainfall totals were moderate."}, {"region": "southeast Australia", "descrpition": "Sunny and dry conditions prevailed across southeast Australia; rainfall was well below average."}]

[{"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "The record heatwave persisted across South Asia with temperatures hovering around 40–42 °C."}, {"region": "Zambia", "descrpition": "Dry weather dominated the south of Africa; drought conditions persisted in Zambia, Angola and Botswana."}, {"region": "central North America", "descrpition": "Additional tornadoes were reported across central North America as the outbreak remained active."}, {"region": "east", "descrpition": "Warm and dry weather returned to the east of South America; high temperatures around 32 °C accompanied the drying trend."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "Stormy conditions swept western Europe, bringing gusty winds and heavy rain."}, {"region": "Unknown", "descrpition": "High pressure maintained dry conditions and moderate temperatures."}]
